overview: Three erotic tales make up this collection from the popular Zalman King series. In “The Art of Loneliness,” a beautiful blind radio show personality experiences an unusual thrill when a couple engages in an intense erotic encounter in her presence. Forbidden zone finds two lovers transported into a futuristic world. And in the picnic, two guys and a girl turn a picnic in the countryside into a comedic scene of love, loss, and last requests.
title: RED SHOE DIARIES: FORBIDDEN ZONE
